citations.narrative:
In the red tailed hawk enclosure, the upper shelf made of particle board was bowed, and could no longer be effectively
cleaned and sanitized. Primary enclosures must be kept in good repair and maintained to ensure surfaces in contact with
birds may be readily cleaned or sanitized or replaced when worn or soiled.
Correct by 31 December, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(ix) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
In the red tailed hawk enclosure, the upper shelf made of particle board was bowed, and could no longer be effectively 
cleaned and sanitized. Primary enclosures must be kept in good repair and maintained to ensure surfaces in contact with 
birds may be readily cleaned or sanitized or replaced when worn or soiled. 
 
Correct by 31 December, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
